item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 15, 2024 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenSCAD: The Programmer's Solid 3D CAD Modeller (238 points | 88 comments)
2. Lazarus Group laundered $200M from 25 crypto hacks to fiat (127 points | 66 comments)
3. Show HN: Wordllama – Things you can do with the token embeddings of an LLM (50 points | 5 comments)
4. A Time Consuming Pitfall for 32-Bit Applications on AArch64 (25 points | 2 comments)
5. Writing a Lisp compiler (Lisp to assembly) from scratch in JavaScript (2018) (27 points | 1 comment)
6. One in five genetics papers contains errors thanks to Microsoft Excel (2016) (219 points | 110 comments)
7. Terence Tao on O1 (536 points | 321 comments)
8. CSCI 181G PO: Game Engine Programming (50 points | 3 comments)
9. We're not going to run out of new anatomy anytime soon (24 points | 7 comments)
10. The Bastard Operator from Hell (1999) (161 points | 53 comments)
11. Writing an OS in Rust (300 points | 39 comments)
12. Making a rickroll laser: A parametric speaker (162 points | 38 comments)
13. Founder Mode, hackers, and being bored by tech (177 points | 48 comments)
14. Show HN: I made a digital circuit drawing and simulation game (34 points | 1 comment)
15. Powerful, Open-Source, Programmatic CAD (6 points | 1 comment)
16. Brsloan/warewoolf: A minimalist novel-writing system/rich text editor (39 points | 9 comments)
17. Where are programming languages created? A zoomable map (9 points | 8 comments)
18. Show HN: Epitomē – A semantic search engine for ancient text (3 points | 4 comments)
19. Dropped Cheetos Could Have Triggered Ecosystem Chaos in Largest US Cave Chamber (10 points | 2 comments)
20. Why Scrum Is Stressing You Out (135 points | 111 comments)
21. Falsehoods programmers believe about TCP (219 points | 161 comments)
22. To forget is an ethical act (87 points | 33 comments)
23. Nesting Arena Allocators in Rust (73 points | 5 comments)
24. USPS' long-awaited new mail truck makes its debut (122 points | 93 comments)
25. Dynamic Viewpoint Symbols (13 points | discuss)
26. Twelve Sentenced for Violent Home Invasion Robberies to Steal Cryptocurrency (96 points | 62 comments)
27. Diffusion Illusions: Hiding Images in Plain Sight (10 points | discuss)
28. LLMs Will Always Hallucinate, and We Need to Live with This (245 points | 207 comments)
29. CCI Finds Samsung, Xiaomi Colluding with Amazon, Flipkart: Report (15 points | 1 comment)
30. The Rise of Open Source Time Series Databases (105 points | 41 comments)
